name: In Sync: 2 Fun Balls
description:
Experience a fun twist in the world of ball games and marble games. This game challenges you with two balls that are controlled in sync. You must skillfully guide them towards their goals without hitting too many traps or falling off the path. Like pinball, golf, or marble race games, but with two balls. That makes solving puzzles so much fun, and challenging.

The game features 100 unique 3D levels. It is easy to learn, fun to play, and a perfect source of entertainment during free time and commute time.

The game is designed to be enjoyed by newcomers and returning players alike. It is completely ad-free, has no in-app payments, and provides a fun experience for the players without interruptions.

Spend your time going balls with balls and have fun!

Features
• 100 unique 3D levels, with 300 total points to collect.
• Easy, one-finger swipe balls control.
• Offline, single-user game.
• Easy, Medium, and Hard mode.
• Race against the clock in Medium and Hard modes.
• No ads. No in-app payments.
• With iCloud support. Start playing on your iPhone, continue on your iPad.
• Lots of fun.
